name: Markdown Community Page
body:
### Welcome to the Markdown Community Page.

[Markdown] is "a text-to-HTML conversion tool for web writers. Markdown allows you to write using an easy-to-read, easy-to-write plain text format, then convert it to structurally valid XHTML (or HTML)."

[Markdown]: http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/

This page is maintained by and for the markdown community to document various tools and resources available to document [authors](#authors) and [developers](#developers) as well as [implementors](#implementors) of the various markdown implementations.

### Authors

Coming soon...

### Developers

Coming soon...

### Implementors

Coming soon...
tagline: By and for the markdown community.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
